welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Divonne-les-Bains, a charming town known for its thermal baths and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and experience the beauty and tranquility of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, mostly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Annemasse Airport, where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lausanne Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
